data.title: Characters
data.meta_description: There are numerous side characters that populate the world of Nintendogs and Nintendogs + Cats. Humans can be encountered on Walks around the neighborhood in Nintendogs and Nintendogs + Cats, and may be mentioned in Competitions. Depending on the experience/Trainer Points a handler has with the...
data.text:
Name Owns Quotes Gallery Additional Info

Adam

Role: Neighbor

Bear the Miniature Schnauzer

"When I first got a dog, I didn't know squat. My care books taught me all about care and training, though."

— Adam, when encountered on Walks

See more of Adam's quotes here.

Not available for this character.

Alan

Role: Neighbor

Butters the Labrador Retriever

"All my life, I always wanted to live in a Designer Condo. It's my life's dream. Shallow, yes. But hey."

— Alan, sharing a special moment

See more of Alan's quotes here.

Not available for this character. Alan and Butters appear in the Chihuahua & Friends version.

Ann

Role: Neighbor

Murphy the Chihuahua

"My pooch loves listening to movie soundtracks, but sometimes I wonder if the music’s changed my pup…"

— Ann, when encountered on Walks

See more of Ann's quotes here.

Not available for this character. Ann and Murphy appear in the Chihuahua & Friends version.

Archie Hubbs

Role:

Neighbor

Songwriter

Dog show commenter

Spot the Shiba Inu

Alaska the Siberian Husky

Unnamed Chihuahua

Four unnamed dogs

Pet duck

"Smelling someone's tush is basically the standard handshake for most dogs. Humans...not so much."

— Archie Hubbs, when encountered on Walks

See more of Archie Hubbs' quotes here.

Click here to see Archie Hubbs's gallery.

Main article: Archie Hubbs

Arnie

Role: Neighbor

Trouble the German Shepherd

"The key to keeping your dog clean is to brush it after you bathe it, in case you didn't already know."

— Arnie, when encountered on Walks

See more of Arnie's quotes here.

Not available for this character. Arnie and Trouble appear in the Chihuahua & Friends version.

Arnie seems interested in dogs' coats and grooming, as he frequently gives grooming advice and will judge your dog's coat.

Audrey

Role: Neighbor

Eclair the Shiba Inu

"Looks like you have a pretty smart Yorkie there. I bet it could do well in obedience trials."

— Audrey, when encountered on Walks

See more of Audrey's quotes here.

Not available for this character.

Billy

Role: Neighbor

Aster the Miniature Dachshund

"You like getting yelled at? Well, neither do puppies, so don't talk too loudly when you're training your dog."

— Billy, when encountered on Walks

See more of Billy's quotes here.

Not available for this character. Billy and Aster appear in the Chihuahua & Friends version.

Billy will often give out advice no matter how many Trainer Points the player has. He also often makes comments about his dog's enjoyment of music.

Bob

Role: Neighbor

Fido the Shetland Sheepdog

See more of Bob's quotes here. Not available for this character. Bob may have an appearance in Nintendogs and Cats-- in the PAL version of the game, there is a character named Bob (though his American name is Joe).

Carmen

Role: Neighbor

Chelsea the Miniature Pinscher

"Oh, wow! A shiba inu! You know, all puppies should be this size."

— Carmen, when encountered on Walks

See more of Carmen's quotes here.

Not available for this character.

Chuck

Role: Neighbor

Cole the Beagle

"Oh, wow! A shiba inu! You know, all puppies should be this size."

— Chuck, when encountered on Walks

See more of Chelsea's quotes here.

Not available for this character. Chuck and Cole appear in the Chihuahua & Friends version.

Emily

Role: Neighbor

Coby the Chihuahua

"(Dog name) just completely adores you! But he/she won't come anywhere near me..."

— Emily, when encountered on Walks

See more of Emily's quotes here.

Not available for this character. Unlike most characters, Emily calls the player's pets by their actual names instead of their breed's name.

Erik

Role: Neighbor

Nugget the Shiba Inu

"We're all a part of this town, aren't we? Yes, we are. So we must do our part and clean up after our dogs.."

— Erik, when the player forgets to pick up their dog's poop

See more of Erik's quotes here.

Not available for this character. Erik and Nugget only appear in the Dachshund & Friends and the Best Friends versions.

Erik takes the responsibility of dog training and care very seriously. When the player neglects to feed, clean, or pick up their dog's poop, he has certain stern words for them.

Jack

Role: Neighbor

Wanda the Cavalier King Charles Spaniel

"Just between you and me, I heard Archie Hubbs sometimes nibbles on dog treats. What a loon!"

— Jack, when encountered on Walks

See more of Jack's quotes here.

Not available for this character. Jack seems to offer advice about how to obtain presents in particular. Jack is also quick to pass judgment, such as gossiping about Archie Hubbs or refusing to pet the player's dirty dogs.

John

Role: Neighbor

Sasha the Pembroke Welsh Corgi

"Yesterday, I met someone else in Bark Mode, and that dog taught my Sasha a new trick!"

— John, when encountered on Walks

See more of John's quotes here.

Not available for this character.

Maria

Role: Neighbor

Petey the Miniature Schnauzer

"So, you like dirty dogs, eh? Well, of course not! So you may as well give it a bath, huh?"

— Maria, when the player's dog is Dirty / Filthy

See more of Maria's quotes here.

Not available for this character.

Matthew

Role: Neighbor

Rusty the Yorkshire Terrier

"When you're trying to teach one dog a new trick, it's vital to be sure that dog is the only one you're looking at."

— Matthew, when encountered on Walks

See more of Matthew's quotes here.

Not available for this character.

Meghan

Role: Neighbor

Charlie the Shih Tzu

"I made Charlie sit the other day, then I said "jump!", and guess what! Charlie did a backflip!"

— Meghan, when encountered on Walks

See more of Meghan's quotes here.

Not available for this character.

Meimei

Role: Neighbor

Angel the Miniature Pinscher

"Oh my goodness! It's (dog name), the current champion! Look at that tone! And that steely eye!"

— Meimei, after the player's dog has won a Championship-level contest.

See more of Meghan's quotes here.

Not available for this character. Meimei frequently gives advice about contests, and takes note of your dog's ranking.

Morgan

Role: Neighbor

Casey the Shih Tzu

"One day, I want to blast off and visit outer space… Is that weird?"

— Morgan, when encountered on Walks

See more of Morgan's quotes here.

Not available for this character. On rare occasions, if Morgan entered Casey in a contest that the trainer entered in, she will say that she was there, too.

Nate

Role: Neighbor

Fathom the Miniature Dachshund

"Did you just leave that pile of poop there? Just touch it to dispose of it! Do it! TOUCH THE POOP!"

— Nate, when the player doesn't pick up after their dog

See more of Nate's quotes here.

Not available for this character.

Rich

Role: Neighbor

Elroy the Chihuahua

See more of Rich's quotes here. Not available for this character.

Pedro

Role: Neighbor

Peaches the Pug

"You know what fascinates me? How a pup's personality can change based on how its Trainer raises it..."

— Pedro, when encountered on Walks

See more of Pedro's quotes here.

Not available for this character. Pedro and Peaches appear in the Chihuahua & Friends version.

Pedro shows interest in dogs' personalities, frequently commenting about their reactions to toys or their breed's temperament.

Ted Rumsworth

Role: Dog show announcer

Unknown

"Here to cover the action is your announcer Ted Rumsworth and my friend and associate, Archie Hubbs!"

— Ted Rumsworth, in competitions

See more of Ted Rumsworth's quotes here.

Click here to see Ted Rumsworth's gallery.

Main article: Ted Rumsworth

Tim

Role: Neighbor

Deacon the Pembroke Welsh Corgi See more of Tim's quotes here. Not available for this character.

Tom

Role: Neighbor

Poppi the Labrador

"My little Poppi dances whenever I play my record player. Isn't that the cutest thing ever?"

— Tom, when encountered on Walks

See more of Tom's quotes here.

Not available for this character.

Tyrone

Role: Neighbor

Buster the Toy Poodle

See more of Tyrone's quotes here. Not available for this character.
